headline: Broadridge Partners with Kids Help Phone, Empowering Youth Mental Health Across Canada
summary: To provide better access to mental health support, Broadridge Financial Solutions Inc. (NYSE:BR) in Canada today announced its official partnership with Kids Help Phone (KHP). Broadridge Canada's philanthropic commitment is a multi-year, multi-faceted partnership that will enable KHP to expand the critical services it provides for youth as Canada's only 24/7, free, confidential, and multilingual e-mental health solution.
